SELECT
TLC.CORP_SEQ ,TLC.PL_MERCHANT_NAME ,FN_PL_M_Z_ID(TLC.PL_MERCHANT_NO) AS PL_MERCHANT_NO ,TLC.PATH_TYP ,FN_CD_DTL('CPT001',TLC.PATH_TYP) AS PATH_TYP_NM ,TLC.REG_SEQ ,TO_CHAR(TLC.REG_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_TIMESTAMP ,TLC.UPD_SEQ ,TO_CHAR(TLC.UPD_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPD_TIMESTAMP FROM TB_LC_CORP TLC
AND TLC.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND TLC.PL_MERCHANT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{plMerchantName},'%')
AND TLC.PL_MERCHANT_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{plMerchantNo},'%')

SELECT TLC.CORP_SEQ ,TLC.PL_MERCHANT_NAME ,FN_PL_M_Z_ID(TLC.PL_MERCHANT_NO) AS PL_MERCHANT_NO ,TLC.PATH_TYP ,FN_CD_DTL('CPT001',TLC.PATH_TYP) AS PATH_TYP_NM ,TLC.REG_SEQ ,TO_CHAR(TLC.REG_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_TIMESTAMP ,TLC.UPD_SEQ ,TO_CHAR(TLC.UPD_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPD_TIMESTAMP FROM TB_LC_CORP TLC
AND TLC.CORP_SEQ = #{corpSeq} AND TLC.USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_LC_CORP
AND PL_MERCHANT_NO != (SELECT PL_MERCHANT_NO FROM TB_LC_CORP B WHERE B.CORP_SEQ = #{corpSeq})
AND PL_MERCHANT_NO = REPLACE(#{plMerchantNo}, '-', '')

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_LC_CORP
AND PL_MERCHANT_NAME = REGEXP_REPLACE(#{plMerchantName}, '^\s+', '') -- 공백제거 AND PL_MERCHANT_NO = REPLACE(#{plMerchantNo}, '-', '')
